title: Australia v England: Ashes second Test, day four – live
summary: England faces a challenging situation in Brisbane, requiring an extraordinary comeback to turn the tide. Follow our writers for live updates and insights from the Gabba as the match unfolds. Keep an eye on the action as the team's performance is crucial in this critical moment.

title: I’m no hate-watcher. I really do love Meghan and her Christmas special | Polly Hudson
summary: The Duchess of Sussex returns, breathing new life into her show, which embraces an over-the-top holiday spirit. While it may come across as cringeworthy, it captures the essence of Christmas festivities. Ultimately, her approach aligns with the joyful extravagance associated with the season.

title: Albanese warns of ‘difficult’ bushfire season ahead as cooler conditions bring relief to disaster-ravaged NSW
summary: Most active fires were contained on Sunday, bringing some relief to affected areas. Disaster payments have been announced for those impacted, as at least 12 homes in Koolewong and four in Bulahdelah were destroyed. Efforts continue to support the affected communities.

title: NSW Central Coast ‘not out of the woods yet’ as bushfire conditions ease – as it happened
summary: The blog has officially shut down operations. Previous content and updates will no longer be available to the public. Readers are encouraged to explore other platforms for similar information.

title: Trump news at a glance: Hegseth faces most serious crisis of tenure
summary: US Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth is facing criticism for his handling of classified military intelligence related to recent Caribbean boat attacks. The incident has sparked significant political controversy and scrutiny of his leadership. These developments highlight ongoing concerns about national security within the current administration.
